title: Handle a Pick Face Stockout
description: A picker is directed to a location, but finds it empty. They must report the stockout so it can be resolved.

tasks.description: The picker arrives at the location and sees it is empty. They use their scanner to report a 'Stockout'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The picker successfully reports the issue for their current task.

tasks.description: The system puts the current picking task on hold.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is paused pending resolution.

tasks.description: The system automatically creates a high-priority cycle count task for the empty location to verify the stockout.
tasks.expected_outcome: An inventory controller is dispatched to verify the empty location.

tasks.description: Simultaneously, the system finds an alternate location (bulk storage) with the same item and directs the original picker there to complete the pick.
tasks.expected_outcome: The picker is rerouted to a new location to get the item, allowing the order to be fulfilled.
